quote.text: Instructions for living a life: Pay attention. Be astonished. Tell about it.
quote.author: Mary Oliver

scripture.text: And let this be a sign unto thee from the Lord, that the Lord will do this thing that he hath spoken.

message:
Hey Ms sunshine ðŸŒº

I just want you to know how deeply proud I am of you... Watching you grow, rise, and fight for your dreams..it's something that fills my heart every day. You deserve every good thing this world has to offer, and more.

Keep going okay? I want you to win in life in every single way... I hope today was kind to you..you deserve happy days always ðŸ’–
